FuncDef:
The smart-link group command creates a Smart Link group and displays the Smart Link group view. If a Smart Link group exists, the command displays the specified Smart Link group view.
The undo smart-link group command deletes a Smart Link group. The smart-link group command creates a Smart Link group and displays the Smart Link group view. If a Smart Link group exists, the command displays the specified Smart Link group view. The undo smart-link group command deletes a Smart Link group. By default, no Smart Link group is created. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a Smart Link group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 48.

ExtraInfo: Smart Link is a reliability mechanism that provides reliable and efficient link backup and a fast traffic switchover. Smart Link is used on dual-homing networks. Before configuring basic functions of Smart Link, run the smart-link group command to create a Smart Link group.
